Verses: 1 yesu Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Niraindhavaraai Yordhaanaivittuth Thirumbi, Aaviyaanavaraale Vanaandharaththirkuk Kondu Pogappattu,
2 naarpadhunaal Pisaasinaal Sodhikkappattaar. Andha Naatkalil Avar Ondrum Pusiyaadhirundhaar; Andha Naatkal Mudindhapinbu Avarukkup Pasiyundaayitru.
3 appozhudhu Pisaasu Avarai Nokki: Neer Dhevanudaiya Kumaaraneyaanaal, Indha Kal Appamaagumpadi Sollum Endraan.
4 avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Manushan Appaththinaalemaaththiramalla, Dhevanudaiya Ovvoru Vaarththaiyinaalum Pizhaippaan Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe Endraar.
5 pinbu Pisaasu Avarai Uyarndha Malaiyinmel Kondupoi, Ulagaththin Sagala Raajyangalaiyum Oru Nimishaththile Avarukkuk Kaanpiththu:
6 ivaigal Ellaavatrinmelumulla Adhikaaraththaiyum Ivaigalin Magimaiyaiyum Umakkuth Tharuven, Ivaigal Enakku Oppukkodukkappattirukkiradhu; Enakku Ishtamaanavanukku Ivaigalaik Kodukkiren.
7 neer Ennaip Panindhukondaal, Ellaam Ummudaiyadhaagum Endru Sonnaan.
8 yesu Avanukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Enakkup Pinnaagappo Saaththaane, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaraip Panindhukondu, Avar Oruvarukke Aaraadhanaiseyvaayaaga Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe Endraar.
9 appozhudhu Avan Avarai Erusalemukkuk Kondupoi, Dhevaalayaththu Upparikaiyin Mel Avarai Niruththi: Neer Dhevanudaiya Kumaaraneyaanaal, Ingeyirundhu Thaazhakkudhiyum.
10 enenil, Ummaik Kaakkumpadikkuth Thammudaiya Thoodhargalukku Ummaikkuriththuk Kattalaiyiduvaar Endrum,
11 umadhu Paadham Kallil Idaraadhapadikku, Avargal Ummaik Kaigalil Endhikkondupovaargal Endrum Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu Endru Sonnaan.
12 adharku Yesu: Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaraip Pareetchai Paaraadhiruppaayaaga Endru Solliyirukkiradhe Endraar.
13 pisaasaanavan Sodhanaiyellaam Mudiththapinbu, Silakaalam Avarai Vittu Vilagipponaan.
14 pinbu Yesu Aaviyaanavarudaiya Balaththinaale Galileyaavukkuth Thirumbip Ponaar. Avarudaiya Keerththi Sutrilum Irukkira Dhesamengum Parambitru.
15 avargaludaiya Jeba Aalayangalil Avar Upadhesiththu, Ellaaraalum Pugazhappattaar.
16 thaan Valarndha Ooraagiya Naasareththukku Avar Vandhu, Thammudaiya Vazhakkaththinpadiye Oivunaalil Jebaaalayaththil Piravesiththu, Vaasikka Ezhundhu Nindraar.
17 appozhudhu Esaayaa Theerkkadharisiyin Pusdhakam Avaridaththil Kodukkappattadhu. Avar Pusdhagaththai Viriththapodhu:

18 karththarudaiya Aaviyaanavar Enmelirukkiraar; Thariththirarukkuch Suviseshaththaip Pirasangikkumpati Ennai Apishegampanninaar; Irudhayam Narungundavargalaik Gunamaakkavum, Siraippattavargalukku Vidudhalaiyaiyum, Kurudarukkup Paarvaiyaiyum Pirasiththappaduththavum, Norungundavargalai Vidudhalaiyaakkavum,
19 karththarudaiya Anukkiraga Varushaththaip Pirasiththappaduththavum, Ennai Anuppinaar, Endru Ezhudhiyirukkira Idaththai Avar Kandu,
20 vaasiththu, Pusdhagaththaich Surutti, Panividaikkaaranidaththil Koduththu, Utkaarndhaar. Jebaaalayaththilulla Ellaarudaiya Kangalum Avarmel Nokkamaayirundhadhu.
21 appozhudhu Avar Avargalode Pesaththodangi: Ungal Kaadhugal Ketka Indha Vedhavaakkiyam Indraiyathdhinam Niraiveritru Endraar.
22 ellaarum Avarukku Narsaatchi Koduththu, Avarudaiya Vaayilirundhu Purappatta Kirubaiyulla Vaarththaigalaik Kuriththu Aachchariyappattu: Ivan Yoseppin Kumaaran Allavaa Endraargal.

23 avar Avargalai Nokki: Vaiththiyane, Unnaiththaane Gunamaakkikkol Engira Pazhamozhiyaich Solli, Naangal Kelvippattapadi Kapparnakoomooril Unnaal Seyyappatta Kiriyaigal Evaigalo Avaigalai Un Ooraagiya Ivvidaththilum Sey Endru Neengal Ennudane Solluveergal Enbadhu Nichchayam.
24 aanaalum Theerkkadharisi Oruvanum Than Oorile Angeegarikkappadamaattaan Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
25 andriyum Eliyaavin Naatkalile Moondru Varushamum Aarumaadhamum Vaanam Adaipattu, Dhesamengum Migundha Panjam Undaayirundhapodhu, Isravelukkul Anegam Vidhavaigal Irundhaargal.
26 aayinum Eliyaa Seedhon Naattilulla Sarepdhaa Oorilirundha Oru Vidhavaiyinidaththirku Anuppapattaaneyallaamal Matroruththiyinidaththirkum Anuppappadavillai.

27 allaamalum Elisaa Theerkkadharisiyin Kaalaththile Isravelarukkulle Anegam Kushtarogigal Irundhaargal; Aayinum Seeriyaa Dhesaththaanaagiya Naagamaaneyallaamal Avargalil Veroruvanum Suththamaakkappadavillai Endru Saththiyaththinpadiye Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
28 jebaaalayaththilirundha Ellaarum Ivaigalaik Kettapozhudhu, Kobamoondu,

29 ezhundhirundhu, Avarai Oorukkup Purampe Thalli, Thangal Oor Kattappattirundha Senguththaana Malaiyin Sigaraththilirundhu Avaraith Thalaikeezhaaith Thallivitumpadikku Avvidaththirkuk Konduponaargal.
30 avaro Avargal Naduvinindru Kadandhupoivittaar.
31 pinbu Avar Galileyaavilulla Kapparnakoom Pattanaththukku Vandhu, Oivu Naatkalil Janangalukkup Podhagampanninaar.
32 avarudaiya Vasanam Adhigaaramulladhaayirundhapadiyaal Avarudaiya Podhagaththaik Kuriththu Avargal Aachchariyappattaargal.
33 jebaaalayaththile Asuththa Aavi Pidiththirundha Oru Manushan Irundhaan.
34 avan: Aiyo! Nasareyanaagiya Yesuve, Engalukkum Umakkum Enna? Engalaikkedukkavaa Vandheer? Ummai Innaarendru Ariven; Neer Dhevanudaiya Parisuththar Endru Uraththasaththamittaan.

35 adharku Yesu: Nee Pesaamal Ivanaivittup Purappattuppo Endru Adhai Adhattinaar; Appozhudhu Pisaasu Avanai Janangalin Naduvile Vizhaththalli, Avanukku Oru Sedhamunjeyyaamal, Avanai Vittup Poivittadhu.
36 ellaarum Aachchariyappattu: Idhu Enna Vaarththaiyo! Adhikaaraththodum Vallamaiyodum Asuththa Aavigalukkum Kattalaiyidugiraar, Avaigal Purappattuppogiradhe Endru Oruvarodoruvar Pesikkondaargal.
37 avarudaiya Keerththi Sutrilumirundha Naadugalilulla Idangalilellaam Pirasiththamaayitru.
38 pinbu Avar Jebaaalayaththai Vittup Purappattu, Seemon Veettil Piravesiththaar, Seemonudaiya Maami Kadum Juramaaik Kidandhaal. Avalukkaaga Avarai Vendikkondaargal.
39 avar Avalidaththil Kunindhunindru, Juram Neengumpadi Kattalaiyittaar, Adhu Avalai Vittu Neengitru; Udane Aval Ezhundhirundhu Avargalukkup Panividaiseydhaal.

40 sooriyan Asthamiththapodhu, Janangalellaarum Thangalukkulle Palapala Viyaadhigalaal Varuththappattavargalai Avaridaththil Konduvandhaargal. Avargal Ovvoruvarmelum Avar Thammudaiya Kaigalai Vaiththu, Avargalaich Sosdhamaakkinaar.

41 pisaasugalum: Neer Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Kiristhu Endru Saththamittu, Anegaraivittup Purappattadhu. Avaraik Kiristhu Endru Pisaasugal Arindhirundhapadiyaal Avar Avaigalaip Pesavottaamal Adhattinaar.
42 udhayamaanapodhu, Avar Purappattu, Vanaandharamaana Oridaththirkup Ponaar. Thiralaana Janangal Avaraiththedi, Avaridaththil Vandhu, Thangalai Vittup Pogaadhapadikku Avarai Niruththikkondaargal.
43 avaro Avargalai Nokki: Naan Matra Oorgalilum Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththaikkuriththup Pirasangikkavendum, Idharkaagave Anuppappatten Endraar.
44 andhappadiye Galileyaa Naattilulla Jebaaalayangalil Pirasangam Pannikkonduvandhaar.
